And now this effect is being priced at 5 mana. It's called [Jace's Ingenuity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace's Ingenuity), and it's in 2011.
  
   
Edit: Ok, I missed the bit about the Ingenuity being an Instant. On another subject, check out the Magic Arcana for 12 July 2010 for a cool alternate-art version of [Concentrate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Concentrate), and four other cards that were custom-made for a recent movie. I especially like Illusory Thoughts.
